code: package mainimport (	fmt	sync	time)var counter intvar wg sync.WaitGroupfunc increment() {	defer wg.Done()	for i := 0; i < 1000; i++ {		value := counter		// 模拟一些处理时间		time.Sleep(time.Millisecond)		counter = value + 1	}}func main() {	wg.Add(2)	go increment()	go increment()	wg.Wait()	fmt.Println(Final Counter: counter)}
